img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a player is engaged in a battle against a boss named "Mother of Stones." The boss's health bar is visible at the bottom of the screen, indicating that it is partially depleted. The environment appears to be a dark, rocky cave, and there are bright, glowing effects surrounding the boss, suggesting an attack or special ability in progress. The player's interface displays various icons and gauges, including health and abilities, on the left and right sides of the screen.
